    SignGUI

    public class ProtocolLibSignGUI
extends AbstractSignGUIManager
    The default implementation of the sign GUI manager. Not intended for direct use by client code.

    nisovian

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open(Player player,
        java.lang.String[] paramdefaultText,
        ResultReceived<Player,java.lang.String[]> response)
        Description copied from interface: SignGUI
        Opens a sign editor GUI for the specified player with text already in it.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to whom the editor will be displayed.
        paramdefaultText - The text already in the editor GUI.
        response - The object which will handle the completion of sign editing. The source is the player, the result is the input value from the sign GUI.

        public void destroy()

        destroy in class AbstractSignGUIManager
